text: Lycaena kasyapa, the green copper, is a small butterfly found in India that belongs to the lycaenids or blues family. left ==See also== *List of butterflies of India *List of butterflies of India (Lycaenidae) ==References== * * * * * * Category:Lycaena Category:Butterflies of India Category:Butterflies described in 1865 Category:Taxa named by Frederic Moore
title: Lycaena kasyapa
